title: Humble Bitcoiners
author: Humble Bitcoiners
content: A beautiful piece of Bitcoin history is up for Raffle on Scarce City. Miner Jones ships it from his Headquarter ü§©https://scarce.city/raffles/2017-kialara-silver-series-to-the-moon-suite-10

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: Humble Bitcoiners on October 10, 2023, 05:57:04 PMA beautiful piece of Bitcoin history is up for Raffle on Scarce City. Miner Jones ships it from his Headquarter ü§©https://scarce.city/raffles/2017-kialara-silver-series-to-the-moon-suite-10Okay, this is new to me, a raffle on scarce.city? So there is an infinite amount of tickets and the market decides which amount seems a fair amount?I like the idea, pretty interesting concept for sure. And good luck with your sales, Humble.

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Heya Kryptowerk, they started doing this shortly. I like the idea of Raffles for expensive collectibles cause everybody gets a chance to win for a fraction of the price that these pieces sell normally. The amount of Tickets is infinite & the market decides fairly. I hope to see more Raffles of valuable collectibles on Scarce City...will there be Cas coins in the future? I like the idea...all the best KW & have a nice weeküòâQuote from: Kryptowerk on October 11, 2023, 01:26:42 AMQuote from: Humble Bitcoiners on October 10, 2023, 05:57:04 PMA beautiful piece of Bitcoin history is up for Raffle on Scarce City. Miner Jones ships it from his Headquarter ü§©https://scarce.city/raffles/2017-kialara-silver-series-to-the-moon-suite-10Okay, this is new to me, a raffle on scarce.city? So there is an infinite amount of tickets and the market decides which amount seems a fair amount?I like the idea, pretty interesting concept for sure. And good luck with your sales, Humble.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Hmm.. Very cool, best of luck to you HumbleBTC. I once had a set get lost in the mail. Very painful, but it was a much higher number. Actually... I will have to check my bluewallet, I forgot I had some funds on there from like many months ago lol

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Heya Owl, thanks Bud...lost in the mailüôà...that's tough...good chance now to get it back. Only 21 Suites exist. Shiny rare beautys at it's best ü•≥Losing Sats is easy...a few here & there. Tried so many Lightning wallets. Can't count themüòÇQuote from: owlcatz on October 11, 2023, 11:21:58 PMHmm.. comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Around 100 Blocks (17h) to go until we take off to the MoonüöÄü•≥

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: I'm happy to see Scarce City doing well. Selling 454 raffle tickets, bought so far, is a nice volume. Seems like there is a decent amount of activity on their sight.

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: That's by far the cheapest Kialara Moon Suite i have seen. Somebody will be really happy hereüçÄüòÇ...the possibility to pay on chain would have been good. Lightning seems to be not as popular as i thoughtGood luck to all the biddersü•≥ü§ó

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: raffle tickets are like miners finding that valid block¬† goodluck miners!

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Exactly Hoop, the bidder who invested most in his "Equipment" has the best chance to mine a block/win a beautiful piece. Congrats MarsüçÄüöÄQuote from: hoopstagaloop on October 13, 2023, 08:10:06 AMraffle tickets are like miners finding that valid block¬† goodluck miners!

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Sorry, i don't really know who likes Scarce City or not. Just know they work their asses of like me to spread Satoshis spiritüçÄü•≥
